# brickbybrick Provider

Interact with the BrickByBrick Fitness API via Terraform.

## Example Usage

```terraform
variable "api_key" {
  type = string
}

provider "brickbybrick" {
  api_key = var.api_key
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) Your BrickByBrick Fitness API Key
